channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This hard-hit emerging market could rebound if Trump’s tariffs are found to be illegal
item.description: Brazil’s onerous taxes and political turmoil make investors wary, but an international court ruling could change their minds.

item.title: This is what Columbia’s $200M deal with the Trump administration means for other schools
item.description: The agreement could push other colleges to preemptively change policies, experts say

item.title: This meme stock stands out in a market that wants to go even higher
item.description: Opendoor Technologies options are less-risky bets on this hot stock. Meanwhile, the S&P 500 continues to defy gravity.

item.title: He’s seen enough bull markets to be worried now. But this veteran investor still likes these tech stocks.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
